Producer: Roy Lee, Chris Bender, Michael Mahoney, Jake Wagner, Jake Weiner
Production Co: The Weinstein Company, Vertigo Entertainment, Eldorado Film, Dimension Films
Rating: PG-13 (Some Teen Drinking|Drug Material|Brief Strong Language|Thematic Elements|Violence/Terror)
Synopsis: High school loner Bird Fitcher finds a vintage Polaroid camera that holds dark and mysterious secrets. She soon realizes that those who get their picture taken by it meet a tragic and untimely death.
Title: Polaroid
